video_prompt: A young woman actively cycles on a forest path. Her long hair flows as she smiles, eyes wide with excitement. The bicycle moves towards the viewer. Sunlight dapples, and the background blurs, conveying dynamic forward motion through the tree tunnel.
image_prompt: Anime style, young woman with windswept brown hair, joyful expression, cycling a light-colored road bike head-on through a sun-dappled forest path. Vibrant colors, dynamic motion blur in background.
refined_video_prompt: Cycling forward, the bicycle progressively approaches the viewer. Long hair streams back with the momentum. A widening smile and excited eyes express joy. Dappled sunlight shifts and flashes. The background dynamically blurs, emphasizing swift motion through the winding path.
